definition: (coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: This is an age-old approach, recommended by many country grandmothers.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種古老的方法，由許多鄉村老奶奶推薦。

sentences.english: The kind grandma shows her mercy on every orphan.
sentences.chinese: 這位仁慈的老奶奶對每個孤兒都很憐惜。

sentences.english: She stood up first so as to help the old lady off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 爲了攙扶那位老奶奶下車，她先站了起來。

sentences.english: Old women all like sitting in the tree shadows and gossiping on summer days.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶們到了夏天都愛坐在樹陰涼兒里拉家常。

sentences.english: Granny quietly touched the small umbrella, and then put her back in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶悄悄摸了摸小花傘，然後把她放回了櫃子。

sentences.english: The part of the old grandmother was played by Julia.
sentences.chinese: 劇中的老奶奶的角色由朱麗亞扮演。

sentences.english: World Cup fever has spread to South African grannies, with dozens of elderly women in aprons and skirts fighting for the ball.
sentences.chinese: 世界盃的旋風颳到了南非的一羣老奶奶身上。

sentences.english: While examining the wandering village herd, he noticed Grandma's Blackie.
sentences.chinese: 他觀察村中漫遊的牧羣，注意到了老奶奶的小黑子。

sentences.english: But the lady just smiled and thanked me.
It's wrong to back grandma into a coner and guard her.
sentences.chinese: 把老奶奶逼到牆角看住她是不對的。

sentences.english: You'll see teenagers and grandmothers, women from sizes petite to plus.
sentences.chinese: 你會看到小姑娘和老奶奶，從嬌小型到龐大型。

sentences.english: This old gramma sits here everyday watching the children play in the street.
sentences.chinese: 這位老奶奶每天都坐在這裏，看着孩子們在街邊玩耍。

sentences.english: This week I have nothing sepecial except helping an old lady across the road.
sentences.chinese: 這周我和平時一樣除了幫助一老奶奶過馬路。

sentences.english: Grandma 24)groped at the fresh paint for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶在還未乾的油漆上摸索片刻。

sentences.english: Bing was a second-team matches grandmother away.
sentences.chinese: 第二隊火柴兵被一位老奶奶帶走了。

sentences.english: On her way to the cinema, Liu Mei met an old woman.
sentences.chinese: 劉梅在去影院的路上遇到了一位老奶奶。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
father's elder brother's wife/aunt (affectionate term for an elderly woman)
grandpa (polite form of address for old man)
(of an elderly couple) husband or wife
